caption.p: Phylogenetic trees of MeV sequences obtained from measles cases, Veneto Region, 2010â€“2018. MeV genotypes B3 ( a), D4 ( b), D8 ( c). Phylogenetic analysis was performed with MEGA 7 [ 22] on the 450-nt carboxyl-terminal sequence of the MeV nucleoprotein ( N) gene, which was available for 61, 11, and 50 samples of B3, D4, and D8 genotypes, respectively. The neighbor-joining method was applied [ 23].
